name: Blink (itch) (ural89)
description: Blink is a top down story driven 2D Horror game for Android, iOS, MacOs and Windows PC still under development.  Arieal has a visitor but he can't look at him.  Beware and close your eyes during disturbing events and experience high quality 3D sound fx and music that is all recorded attentively. Don't Forget  To Wear Your Headphones!
